Nighstrike:

Nighstrike transformed to Aurora jet mode and fired 25 times against 
Sideswip while he avoided maximal's shot

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Torca/Sideswipe:::
> 
> ::Torca hears Klant::
> Torca: In normal ircumstances, i would disagree, but I find that i 
agree with 
> you.  What are we going to do about it?
> ::Torca dodges the ionic displacer beams.  When Klant is hit he 
hesitates, 
> then gets enraged::
> Torca: Hey, you attack me, fine, but when you do that to my pal, 
you pay!
> ::he switched his dorsal gun to automatic nail gun.  he fires 25 
nails  at 
> Astroblast::
> ~~~~~
> ::He dodged some of the shots, but got hit with a lot of them.  He 
took out 
> his automatic rifle and fired 25 shots at Nightstrike::
